website_summaries.verdict: An attention-grabbing boot that's not for the faint of heart, for good reason.
pros: Flashy and fabulous - an instant conversation starter
A comfortable fit despite the notable bling
Boots fit especially well for those with larger calves and those who intend to wear the boots for hours at a time
cons: The coloring does not always align with the advertised images

customer_reviews.title: These boots are FIRE!!! Knee highs if you have thick thighs!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE BOOTS! BUT: THICK THIGHS BEWARE!!!!! I wear a size 10 in jeans and I was looking forward to these going up mid thigh but barely go over my knee. The fabric does not stretch. I don’t like that because it leaves so much fabric/sequins at the calf and it makes my calfs look HUGE!!! Overall, wonderful buy 🤩 Also, they seem more emerald green in the light but when not exposed to much light you see more of the blue. They are still so beautiful and I’m so happy I bought them for my birthday party!!!
customer_reviews.author: 1 Hot MaMa of Twins

customer_reviews.title: In love with these boots
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are fire🔥 🔥 🔥 😍😍😍 they fit perfectly and are very comfortable. I have skinny legs and these boots hold up pretty well. They look just like the picture. I bought a 39 which is a size 8 in China size, they are sequins, trust me these boots look even better in person
customer_reviews.author: NIKki💋

customer_reviews.title: these are somewhat comfortable because of the peeptoe and zipper
customer_reviews.text: I wore the green/blue iridescent sequin boot out for the first time last night and was stopped constantly for compliments. As far as drag boots go, these are somewhat comfortable because of the peeptoe and zipper. My one concern is the zipper may not hold up after multiple wears.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These boots make me feel like a queen
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god I am a queen in these. I am obsessed- they are beautiful and super high. I’m a 6- which I ordered and they seem a little big but nothing crazy- if you’re concerned SIZE DOWN. Also I noticed a few sequins came off already hopefully that’s not foreshadowing what’s to come. I also got a matching jacket and I feel so great ahhh!!! Follow me amazon pics:
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Lundeberg

customer_reviews.title: Traumatic..
customer_reviews.text: The spike broke after wearing them for a few hours. It was held on by two short staples! Not the quality I expected. And wearing these till getting home sucked. Style wise these boots are stunning! The ankle is a little narrow. If your ankles are swollen these won't fit. They stayed up and the material is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: OrangeSodaM0n

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Total Showstoppers!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! They were totally in line with the expectations I had and even a little comfier than I thought. Based off the reviews I knew they’d likely not be the sturdiest pair ever but I’ll wear ‘em until the heels break and get new heels put on and keep wearing them (no issues so far!) A total show stopper! I wore them for New Years and got tons of compliments. They’d also be perfect for Vegas, a bachelorette, costumes, etc. A must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: What a great price and unusual look these boots are. I've never seen a pair this different and I should know, having over 200 pair of boots! You will definitely be notice when you wear these but don't cross your legs a lot. It tends to snap off sequins. The fit is true to size and they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous!!!! I have thick calves so they are a bit tight around them but they are bomb!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... five stars but they are more green than I like. The picture shows more blue but they are ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give this five stars but they are more green than I like. The picture shows more blue but they are actually pretty leprechaun green lol. I made them work by moving the sequins around so it wasn’t too bad. Gonna order the black ones. They are cute and worth the money. Not comfy at all though.
customer_reviews.author: Lamonica Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Goes past mid-thigh, SO HOT!!
customer_reviews.text: Just a smidge bigger than my regular 10 shoe--but theses shoes are HOT!! They go up past your mid-thigh just so you know--and if you're a little thicker that could be an issue. But I LOVE them.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Smoking hot. Got so many compliments
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots look great! I am not a skinny girl curvy and my legs are not skinny I played soccer so they’re a little thicker definitely not thin and these fit fine they actually on the side were slipping down some but fit over my calf great they just need to be stretched a little bit then they were fine and they look smoking hot. Got so many compliments! Went to a Too $hort concert in them and then walked around Sacramento in them to take pics at capital not unfortable at and held up like a champ. Picture of just the boot is after all that the next day
customer_reviews.author: GFT

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, but for tiny calves
customer_reviews.text: My calves are about 15" around. I couldn't get these boots to fit to save my life. The foot part fit fine, and they were comfortable otherwise, but if you can't get your boots up to where they belong, there's really no point. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Lexieh

customer_reviews.title: Very sparkly
customer_reviews.text: When I received it I love the way it looks it is true to size but it has no stretch to it . I don’t have big thighs and it went a little above my knees so maybe you have to go up a size if you want it to go to the mid thighs. Just could have done better with material
customer_reviews.author: Pinkdaze

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: I could only get 1 wear out of these. Not comfortable at all. The first 20 minutes were fine. Then I started walking funny because the heels kept going different ways. The bottom of the boot started peeling as well. These are definitely over priced. I did get a lot of compliments though
customer_reviews.author: Loving Mother

customer_reviews.title: Eye Catcher!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!!! I'm all for the glitz and glam and the boots are just that. I was nervous about ordering them just because I was scared they wouldnt look like pics but to my surprise they were everything I wanted them to look like! I even got the matching jacket. I ordered size 8 and they were a perfect fit and seemed comfortable I'll know for sure once I wear out tmrw night!
customer_reviews.author: Miyakia Mcneal

customer_reviews.title: The Glue Smell is AWFUL!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are beautiful and well made. The factory smell of the glue though used to bind the soles though is VERY overpowering and they need to sit outside for a few days to air out. Other than that they are a beautiful shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaddict

customer_reviews.title: "WORTH BUYING"
customer_reviews.text: Omg I fell in love with these boots the 1st time I seen them on Amazon. I ordered them and they came in a timely manner. I purchased these boots for my 40th Birthday and have no regrets. They shined when I walked, they made me feel like a million bucks. I recommend these boots for anyone that likes a stiletto heel. I did buy the boot a half size lower because they didn't have a 8 but the 7 1/2 fit good as well just a little tight at the ankle so these boots are true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Rah Diggah

customer_reviews.title: Boots stole the night
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots... all eyes were on my boots for New Years... beautiful gold sequin color, fit just right... so many complement from men and women.
customer_reviews.author: KBW_Review

customer_reviews.title: Heel Broke
customer_reviews.text: I ordered silver and received black. They were cute so I decided to keep them. I got yo the concert at 5:30 and by 7pm, the heel was broke. They are cute enough that I would try them again to see if I got a bad pair or poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: These Boots Baby, Let Me Tell You!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. These boots not only look fabulous they fit fabulous. I’m not a thin girl 5.1 200lbs and I was able to stand in and dance in these boots all night with no problems. They’re beautiful and sturdy. Would recommend these boots always. I was also able to locate a matching sequence purse.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Jay

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable, boot tore while trying it on
customer_reviews.text: Could not wear for more than 1 hour they have no padding in the bottom. The calf part of the boot tore while trying them on I had to pin it back together to wear to my event
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Moore

customer_reviews.title: fits true to size and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: these are so sexy, they are very long and come up over the knee. I am 6ft and these fit my legs perfect. I love the comfort an the sparkles. these are awesome boots and love them, the heel is high and they are stellios
customer_reviews.author: Dana Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The material in here is slightly loose. I had to take it to someone to tighten some cheap work, but they're great after that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YES LADIES!
customer_reviews.text: Baby talking about sexy! I have not worn the shoes yet but I have tried them on and omg, they're giving me all types of sexy!! I have big legs so I may have to return them for a 9 but trust me you'll love them!!
customer_reviews.author: B.Hill

customer_reviews.title: Sexy but yet COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: I wore these boots all night and my feet did not hurt one bit!!

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: The boots feel great and they work great. The only downside is that the soles are pretty slippery, but other than that they work great.

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong size
customer_reviews.text: I went for a size 6 wide, I even asked a questi ok n about it. And I received a size 8.5. So I gotta return them and get a refund. Boots are good quality though

customer_reviews.title: OMG the pain

As far as sizing I normally wear a 7.5 but should have went up to a 8. I just tried them on and walk around and so far so good. This shoe is bad!!!!! I can't wait to stunt in them. I gave it only 4 stars simply bc the packaging was kind of trash.

Boots are fabulous I'm in love with them. Can't wait to wear them on my bday. Only thing is if you have big thighs oil up so they will go up your legs other than that these boots fye

product_meta.title: Women's Over The Knee High Heels Boots Fashion Sparkle Sequins Peep Toe Christmas Party Dance Stiletto Booties
product_meta.description:
Women's Fashion Peep Toe Sparkle Sequins Thigh High Over Knee Pupms Heel Christmas Party Dance Boots.

Should you have any question, please feel free to contact us with emails. We always be sincerely answer your question and try our best to meet all your requests.
feature_bullets: Side zipper closure for very easy pull on and warm lining. Non-slip rubber soles and Comfortable foot pad latex insole.

Tested Size US6 : Heel heihth: 4.72＂(approx), platform Measures:0.2＂(approx),Shaft Height: 24.8＂(approx) ,Ankle girth: 10＂(approx) , leg girth:14＂(approx) ,Top opening circumference : 18.5＂(approx). Other sizes: please refer to the size table.

Sequins knee high boots Glamour is all about sparkle,Its unique aura and elegant luster, every detail is about "I am the queen" these four words, whether it is professional wear or go shopping when wearing, sequined shoes are able to HOLD the audience show a strong aura of a protagonist.

Occasion: masquerade, birthday party, disco, race car, graduation show, talent show or reality show.This pair of boots easily matches your outfit. You can pair these boots with your short jeans, short skirts, hot pants, short skirts, leggings, windbreaker, long down jacket and long sweater.
